newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass in licensing deal with Thomson.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass in licensing deal with Thomson.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Monday it signed a licensing and professional services agreement with Thomson Consumer Electronics Inc.
Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.
Thomson, a unit of Thomson SA, provides televisions and related video services in the United States under the RCA, GE and ProScan brands.

Under the agreement, Spyglass's Web client technology will be used in an electronic programming guide, provided as part of a personalized Internet service included in Thomson's RCA-brand Network Computer/Consumer product, the company said.
Spyglass provides software and services to make devices work with the World Wide Web.
